3183.verse: وَجَدتُّهَا|And I found her|123|141|13169$وَقَوْمَهَا|and her people|118|155|13170$يَسْجُدُونَ|prostrating|104|141|3183$لِلشَّمْسِ|to the sun|90|127|13171$مِن دُونِ ٱللَّهِ|instead of Allah,|143|161|2971$وَزَيَّنَ|and has made fair-seeming|198|212|5587$لَهُمُ|to them|72|100|1027$ٱلشَّيْطَـٰنُ|the Shaitaan|105|133|379$أَعْمَـٰلَهُمْ|their deeds,|99|127|1459$فَصَدَّهُمْ|and averted them|138|152|13172$عَنِ|from|54|91|1663$ٱلسَّبِيلِ|the Way,|83|157|1019$فَهُمْ|so they|70|144|152$لَا|(are) not|80|154|30$يَهْتَدُونَ|guided,|91|128|4371$

3184.verse: أَلَّا|That not|78|88|2011$يَسْجُدُواْ|they prostrate|116|135|13173$لِلَّهِ|to Allah,|75|94|6$ٱلَّذِى|the One Who|107|126|138$يُخْرِجُ|brings forth|96|115|5858$ٱلْخَبْءَ|the hidden|90|109|13174$فِى|in|48|58|89$ٱلسَّمَـٰوَٲتِ|the heavens|115|132|351$وَٱلْأَرْضِ|and the earth|111|146|352$وَيَعْلَمُ|and knows|90|125|2761$مَا|what|53|88|262$تُخْفُونَ|you conceal|100|135|4823$وَمَا|and what|82|99|46$تُعْلِنُونَ|you declare,|102|102|9919$

3186.verse: ۞ قَالَ|He said,|96|111|309$سَنَنظُرُ|"We will see|99|129|13175$أَصَدَقْتَ|whether you speak (the) truth|223|253|13176$أَمْ|or|38|68|62$كُنتَ|you are|70|100|1281$مِنَ|of|50|65|156$ٱلْكَـٰذِبِينَ|the liars.|98|98|2956$

3189.verse: إِنَّهُۥ|Indeed, it|84|98|396$مِن|(is) from|76|105|53$سُلَيْمَـٰنَ|Sulaiman|89|118|949$وَإِنَّهُۥ|and indeed it (is),|138|167|1195$بِسْمِ|`In the name|108|137|1$ٱللَّهِ|(of) Allah,|86|100|2$ٱلرَّحْمَـٰنِ|the Most Gracious,|145|340|3$ٱلرَّحِيمِ|the Most Merciful,|140|335|4$

3190.verse: أَلَّا|That not|78|93|2011$تَعْلُواْ|exalt yourselves|127|156|13181$عَلَىَّ|against me,|97|126|4174$وَأْتُونِى|but come to me|125|154|9256$مُسْلِمِينَ|(in) submission."'|131|146|6716$

3192.verse: قَالُواْ|They said,|89|102|101$نَحْنُ|"We|62|88|103$أُوْلُواْ|(are) possessors|130|156|7808$قُوَّةٍ|(of) strength|106|132|7339$وَأُوْلُواْ|and possessors|121|147|2698$بَأْسٍ|(of) might|86|99|13184$شَدِيدٍ|great,|67|98|8651$وَٱلْأَمْرُ|and the command|138|200|6458$إِلَيْكِ|(is) up to you,|116|178|11145$فَٱنظُرِى|so look|99|161|13185$مَاذَا|what|58|89|271$تَأْمُرِينَ|you will command."|146|146|13186$

3194.verse: وَإِنِّى|But indeed, I am|129|137|2795$مُرْسِلَةٌ|going to send|110|126|13191$إِلَيْهِم|to them|72|88|3030$بِهَدِيَّةٍ|a gift|72|88|13192$فَنَاظِرَةُۢ|and see|88|104|13193$بِمَ|with what|86|102|13194$يَرْجِعُ|return|75|83|11582$ٱلْمُرْسَلُونَ|the messengers."|134|134|9808$

3182.verse: Indeed, I found [there] a woman ruling them, and she has been given of all things, and she has a great throne.

3183.verse: I found her and her people prostrating to the sun instead of Allah, and Satan has made their deeds pleasing to them and averted them from [His] way, so they are not guided,

3184.verse: [And] so they do not prostrate to Allah, who brings forth what is hidden within the heavens and the earth and knows what you conceal and what you declare -

3185.verse: Allah - there is no deity except Him, Lord of the Great Throne."

3186.verse: [Solomon] said, "We will see whether you were truthful or were of the liars.

3187.verse: Take this letter of mine and deliver it to them. Then leave them and see what [answer] they will return."

3188.verse: She said, "O eminent ones, indeed, to me has been delivered a noble letter.

3189.verse: Indeed, it is from Solomon, and indeed, it reads: 'In the name of Allah, the Entirely Merciful, the Especially Merciful,

3190.verse: Be not haughty with me but come to me in submission [as Muslims].' "

3191.verse: She said, "O eminent ones, advise me in my affair. I would not decide a matter until you witness [for] me."

3192.verse: They said, "We are men of strength and of great military might, but the command is yours, so see what you will command."

3193.verse: She said, "Indeed kings - when they enter a city, they ruin it and render the honored of its people humbled. And thus do they do.

3194.verse: But indeed, I will send to them a gift and see with what [reply] the messengers will return."
